languages.text: "Если бы ты знал{mf||а} хоть каплю истины о моем Боге, то уже извивал{mf|ся|ася} бы на полу, моля о быстрой смерти!" {n}Поглощенный фанатичной отповедью, Немезит уже не так точно держит вас в прицеле оружия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Если бы ты знал{mf||а} хоть каплю истины о моем Боге, то уже извивал{mf|ся|ася} бы на полу, моля о быстрой смерти. Но ты веришь в ложь. В пустоту. В ничто!" {n}Поглощенный фанатичной отповедью, Немезит уже не так точно держит вас в прицеле оружия.{/n}

languages.text: "If you knew even a shred of truth about my god, you would already be grovelling on the floor, begging for a swift death!" {n}Absorbed in his zealous rejoinder, Nemesite is no longer holding you firmly in the sights of his weapon.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Если бы ты знал{mf||а} хоть каплю истины о моем Боге, то уже извивал{mf|ся|ася} бы на полу, моля о быстрой смерти!" {n}Поглощенный фанатичной отповедью, Немезит уже не так точно держит вас в прицеле оружия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "If you knew even a shred of truth about my god, you would already be grovelling on the floor, begging for a swift death!" {n}Absorbed in his zealous rebuff, Nemesite no longer has you in his sights as firmly as before.{/n}
{n}The confidence in your voice hits Nemesis like a lash, his pupils dilate and his finger trembles restlessly on the trigger.{/n} "Your god is a lie!"

"If you knew even a shred of truth about my god, you would already be grovelling on the floor, begging for a swift death!" {n}Absorbed in his zealous rejoinder, Nemesite is no longer holding you firmly in the sights of his weapon.{/n}
{n}The confidence in your voice hits Nemesis like a lash. His pupils dilate, and his finger trembles restlessly against the trigger.{/n} "Your god is a lie!"

"If you knew even a shred of truth about my god, you would already be grovelling on the floor, begging for a swift death!" {n}Absorbed in his zealous rejoinder, Nemesite is no longer holding you firmly in the sights of his weapon.{/n}

"If you knew even a shred of truth about my god, you would already be grovelling on the floor, begging for a swift death!" {n}Absorbed in his zealous rebuff, Nemesite no longer has you in his sights as firmly as before.{/n}

"If you knew even a shred of truth about my god, you would already be grovelling on the floor, begging for a swift death!" {n}Absorbed in his zealous rejoinder, Nemesite is no longer holding you firmly in the sights of his weapon.{/n}

"If you knew even a shred of truth about my god, you would already be grovelling on the floor, begging for a swift death!" {n}Absorbed in his zealous rejoinder, Nemesite is no longer holding you firmly in the sights of his weapon.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Selbstsicherheit in deiner Stimme trifft Nemesit wie ein Peitschenhieb. Seine Augen weiten sich, und sein Finger am Auslöser zittert rastlos.{/n} "Euer Gott ist eine Lüge!"
languages.original_text: {n}The confidence in your voice hits Nemesite like a lash. His pupils dilate, and his finger trembles restlessly against the trigger.{/n} "Your god is a lie!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Selbstsicherheit in deiner Stimme trifft Nemesit wie ein Peitschenhieb. Seine Augen weiten sich, und sein Finger am Auslöser zittert rastlos.{/n} "Euer Gott ist eine Lüge!"
{n}Die Selbstsicherheit in deiner Stimme trifft Nemesit wie ein Peitschenhieb. Seine Augen weiten sich, und sein Finger am Auslöser zittert rastlos.{/n} "Euer Gott ist eine Lüge!"

languages.text: «¡Si supieras la más mínima verdad sobre mi dios ya estarías en el suelo, suplicando una muerte rápida!». {n}Absorto en su apasionada respuesta, Nemesitio deja de apuntarte con su arma.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you knew even a shred of truth about my god, you would already be grovelling on the floor, begging for a swift death!" {n}Absorbed in his zealous rejoinder, Nemesite is no longer holding you firmly in the sights of his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Si supieras la más mínima verdad sobre mi dios ya estarías en el suelo, suplicando una muerte rápida!». {n}Absorto en su apasionada respuesta, Nemesitio deja de apuntarte con su arma.{/n}
{n}La confianza de tu voz azota a Nemesitio como un látigo. Sus pupilas se dilatan y su dedo tiembla imparable en el gatillo.{/n} «¡Tu dios es una farsa!».

languages.text: 「私の神の真実の一片でも知っていれば、お前はすでに床にうずくまり、速やかな死を懇願しているはずだ！」 {n}熱狂的な反論に没頭するネメサイトは、もはやあなたを武器の照準にきちんと捉えていない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you knew even a shred of truth about my god, you would already be grovelling on the floor, begging for a swift death!" {n}Absorbed in his zealous rejoinder, Nemesite is no longer holding you firmly in the sights of his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私の神の真実の一片でも知っていれば、お前はすでに床にうずくまり、速やかな死を懇願しているはずだ！」 {n}熱狂的な反論に没頭するネメサイトは、もはやあなたを武器の照準にきちんと捉えていない。{/n}
{n}自信に満ちた声が、ネメサイトに鞭のように突き刺さる。瞳孔が開き、引き金を引く指が落ち着きなく震えた。{/n}「お前の神は、まやかしだ！」

languages.text: “哪怕你对我所敬畏的神明有一丁点了解，你就会早早地跪在地上，祈求我给你个痛快！”{n}涅墨斯特带着狂热的怒火，全神贯注地驳斥着你的话，手中的枪也不再死死地瞄准你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you knew even a shred of truth about my god, you would already be grovelling on the floor, begging for a swift death!" {n}Absorbed in his zealous rejoinder, Nemesite is no longer holding you firmly in the sights of his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “哪怕你对我所敬畏的神明有一丁点了解，你就会早早地跪在地上，祈求我给你个痛快！”{n}涅墨斯特带着狂热的怒火，全神贯注地驳斥着你的话，手中的枪也不再死死地瞄准你。{/n}
{n}你声音中的信念像鞭子一样抽在涅墨斯特身上。他的瞳孔变大了，搭在扳机上的手指不安地颤抖着。{/n}“你的神明是个谎言！”

languages.text: « Si vous connaissiez ne serait-ce qu'une bribe de vérité à propos de mon dieu, vous seriez déjà en train de ramper à mes pieds en implorant une mort rapide ! » {n}Tout à son laïus illuminé, Némésite a cessé de braquer le réticule de son arme sur votre personne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you knew even a shred of truth about my god, you would already be grovelling on the floor, begging for a swift death!" {n}Absorbed in his zealous rejoinder, Nemesite is no longer holding you firmly in the sights of his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si vous connaissiez ne serait-ce qu'une bribe de vérité à propos de mon dieu, vous seriez déjà en train de ramper à mes pieds en implorant une mort rapide ! » {n}Tout à son laïus illuminé, Némésite a cessé de braquer le réticule de son arme sur votre personne.{/n}
{n}L'assurance dans votre voix cingle Némésite. Ses pupilles se dilatent et son doigt tremble nerveusement sur la gâchette.{/n} « Votre dieu n'est qu'un mensonge ! »
